languages.text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.
Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.
Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

languages.text: Один раз за бой, после тарана вражеского пустотного корабля, можно использовать дополнительную особую способность. Все особые способности {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} восстанавливается на +25%.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

languages.text: Une fois par combat, après avoir éperonné un vaisseau ennemi, vous pouvez utiliser une capacité ultime supplémentaire. Toutes les barres de temps de recharge ultimes du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} sont restaurées de 25 % supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, après avoir éperonné un vaisseau spatial ennemi, vous pouvez utiliser une capacité ultime supplémentaire. Toutes les barres de récupération ultimes du vaisseau amiral sont restaurées de 25 % supplémentaires.

languages.text: Einmal pro Kampf kann eine zusätzliche ultimative Fähigkeit eingesetzt werden, nachdem ein feindliches Raumschiff gerammt wurde. Alle Balken der ultimativen Abklingzeit des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} regenerieren +25 %.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Einmal pro Kampf kann eine zusätzliche ultimative Fähigkeit eingesetzt werden, nachdem ein feindliches Raumschiff gerammt wurde. Alle Leisten der ultimativen Abklingzeit des Flaggschiffs werden um +25 % wiederhergestellt.

languages.text: 戦闘ごとに1度、敵のヴォイドシップに突撃した後、追加で究極アビリティを使用できる。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の究極アビリティのクールダウンバーが+25%回復する。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘ごとに1度、敵のヴォイドシップに突撃した後、追加で究極アビリティを使用できる。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の究極アビリティのクールダウンバーが+25%回復する。
戦闘ごとに1度、敵のヴォイドシップに突撃した後、追加で究極アビリティを使用できる。旗艦の究極アビリティのクールダウンバーが+25%回復する。

languages.text: 每场战斗一次，当您的旗舰使用撞角撞击敌方虚空舰之后，可以额外使用一次终极能力。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}所有终极能力的冷却时间恢复25%。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗一次，当您的旗舰使用撞角撞击敌方虚空舰之后，可以额外使用一次终极能力。旗舰所有终极能力的冷却时间恢复25%。
每场战斗一次，当您的旗舰使用撞角撞击敌方虚空舰之后，可以额外使用一次终极能力。旗舰所有终极能力的冷却时间恢复25%。

languages.text: Una vez por combate, tras usar el ariete contra una nave enemiga, puedes usar una capacidad definitiva adicional. Todas las barras de recuperación de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se recuperan un +25 %.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por combate, tras usar el ariete contra una nave enemiga, puedes usar una capacidad definitiva adicional. Todas las barras de recuperación de la nave insignia se recuperan un +25 %.

languages.text: Çatışmada bir kez, bir düşman uçsuz gemisine koçbaşıyla vurduktan sonra ilave bir üstün kabiliyet kullanılabilir. {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} tüm üstün dolum süresi çubuklarının +%25'i tazelenir.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, after ramming an enemy voidship, an additional ultimate ability can be used. All of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s ultimate cooldown bars are restored by +25%.
